name: Snowball Showdown (Pixel Pincher)
description:
In Snowball Showdown 6 orcs and humans throw snowballs at their opponents and avoid being hit themselves in order to emerge victorious. A casual 2D top down brawler.

Controls:

Game Controller or WASD + [Space]

Objective:

In the Playground mode there is no win or lose condition, just throwing some snowballs.
In the Challenge mode you have 30 seconds to get the most points. +3 for every hit, -1 for getting hit.

Thank you very much for playing! Every feedback is very appreciated!
